org.restlet.ext.xml
Class Transformer

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.routing.Filter
          org.restlet.ext.xml.Transformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Uniform
public class Transformer
extends Filter

Filter that can transform XML representations by applying an XSLT transform sheet. It uses the TransformRepresentation to actually transform the XML entities.

Concurrency note: instances of this class or its subclasses can be invoked by several threads at the same time and therefore must be thread-safe. You should be especially careful when storing state in member variables.

Author:
Jerome Louvel

canTransform

protected boolean canTransform(Representation representation)
Indicates if the filter can transform the given message entity. By default, it always returns true.

Parameters:
representation - The entity representation to test.
Returns:
True if the transformation can be applied.
